name: Bobby The Bee
description:
FLY and JUMP with Bobby the Bee across the highest tower to save the bees that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

When Bobby learns about the bees stuck inside the top of the haunted tower, he sets out to free them from the evil Jewel Ghost to restore the kingdom of the bees. You are Bobby! It's up to you to save the bees from the schemes of Jewel to save Spring!

--- ENDLESS FLYING FUN FOR ALL ---
▪ Cute gameplay with easy-to-learn one-tap controls.
▪ Rich colorful HD graphics and stunning cinematic gameplay.
▪ Lightning-fast acrobatics and unexpected fiery twists!

'Bobby The Bee' Story and Activity Book are available now on Amazon.
